pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Model Specification in the Latent Variable Framework // Tools for model specification in the latent variable framework (add-on to the 'lava' package). The package contains three main functionalities: Wald tests/F-tests with improved control of the type 1 error in small samples, adjustment for multiple comparisons when searching for local dependencies, and adjustment for multiple comparisons when doing inference for multiple latent variable models.
